item.title: About me
item.author: rwalt@pm.me (Ryan W. Walter)
item.description: Hello! My name is Ryan, aliased as Rwaltr, and I am a Linux administrator by hobby, by profession and Linux nut by passion. I tend to spend my time learning new open source technology, maintaining my homelab, playing games (On Linux!), or trying to find the next big thing. How long have you been using linux? Since 2016, Started with Fedora Linux! I have also used Manjaro, Although I am back on Fedora.
